gw.plugin.archiving

Class ArchiveSource

  • gw.plugin.document.impl.BaseLocalDocumentContentSource
    • gw.plugin.archiving.ArchiveSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    _proxy_.gw.lang.reflect.gs.IGosuObject, IArchiveSource

    public class ArchiveSource
extends BaseLocalDocumentContentSource
implements IArchiveSource, _proxy_.gw.lang.reflect.gs.IGosuObject
    This class implements the IArchiveSource interface. This example implementation uses the BaseLocalDocumentContentSource so that the store/retrieval bypasses the async storage mechanism, i.e., writing the graph to a message seems wasteful of message history space and is not needed for reliability. It might be possible to implement this in terms of the customer's own plugin depending on whether they break down their plugin.
